name: emscripten-opencv
description: Web app calling into C++ WebAssembly code that uses OpenCV

scripts.build:opencv: docker run --rm -t -w /src -v "$PWD"/../opencv:/src/opencv emscripten/emsdk sh -c 'EMSCRIPTEN=/emsdk/upstream/emscripten python3 opencv/platforms/js/build_js.py opencv/build_wasm --build_wasm'
scripts.heroku-postbuild: echo use contents of dist folder
